summary: A reclusive beekeeper slowly pulls his dysfunctional family back together, but not without having to fight his son's previous dastardly cohorts.
cast: Peter Fonda|Patricia Richardson|Christine Dunford|Tom Wood|Jessica Biel|Vanessa Zima|Steven Flynn|Dewey Weber|J. Kenneth Campbell|Traber Burns|Ryan Marshall|Chad Fish|Will Sexton|Dale C. Marshall|James T. Whitehurst|Charles Branner|Jim Flanagan
keywords: tape over mouth|man wears eyeglasses|beekeeper|dysfunctional family|tied to a chair
title: El oro de Ulises
